meanings.definition: A synthetic corticosteroid drug used to treat a variety of conditions, including inflammation and autoimmune disorders.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed prednisone to reduce the swelling in my joints.
meanings.sent2: She takes prednisone daily to manage her autoimmune condition.
meanings.sent3: After taking prednisone, I felt like a deflated balloon, but in a good way.
meanings.sent4: The prednisone acted like a superhero, fighting off the inflammation in my body.
meanings.sent5: The prednisone pill was like a tiny warrior battling the autoimmune army within me.
